Heartbleed
Team 50s 3307 Group Project. A platformer game where you, the user, is spawned in as a computer bug with the goal of infiltrating and infecting the computer system. Navigate through the terrain, avoid/defeat enemies, enjoy a beautiful soundtrack and attempt to conquer the final boss.

Detailed Description

Represents a bullet projectile that can be fired by players or enemies.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Bullet::Bullet ( sf::Vector2f size,
int owner )

Constructs a bullet with a given size and owner.

Parameters
sizeDimensions of the bullet.
ownerIdentifier for the owner (0 = Player, 1 = Enemy).
